There pre fileld data for 2000 areas of the interests. In general/introducion This is frontend for the backend, which is done/impelemented for Data Modelling and Back-end Development, YTSP0200-3004 The app show the NDVI images fo the specifig area of interest, plants fields in range of dates of few years for the growing season to the harvest. Why at this way faemres and the other involving agriculture can follow the groving phases of the specifig geometry areas e.g plants standard deviarion telss how stedy is or not the growt of the specifig area. Link to Page 2 tämä on vain kokeilu linkistä ei muuta NDVI what is NDVI, it comes from Normalized Difference Vegetation Index For this app the there is also backend which provides NDVI data from different areas from sentinelhub services which prosessing images and coreesposndong data statistics from the satellite images. https://www.sentinel-hub.com/ This font end is just for request data from the server api and serve UI to show and request from backednd api routes.

docs.text: Deployment This frontend application is a part of MERN-stack, so for the deployment the app should be build. npm run build and the build folder should be copied to backend's root. In this work frontend is located in the same server than backend build folder voisi oilla jokin muukin tsekkaa kuinka ja mihin määritellään!!!! Here is the link to the deployment for whole MERN-stack. Staring the application App runs on a Azure https://ndvidemo.azurewebsites.net but it is possible to install as a application, which actually/in fact is running in address https://ndvidemo.azurewebsites.net. Install application

docs.text: Login this frontend is a part of MERN-stack which has token-based authetication token-based authentication sequenceDiagram autonumber participant Client participant Server participant MongoDb Client->>Server: POST /ndvi/api/v1/login {username, password} alt Authentication Successful Server->>MongoDb: Validate user credentials MongoDb-->>Server: Acknowledge validation Server-->>Client: Status 200 (Login successful, TOKEN returned as message body) else Authentication Failed Server-->>Client: Status 401 (Login failed, invalid credentials) end request for login to backend route with usernama and password validate credentials returns information of the success or not if insertion is successful status code 200 is returned with TOKEN as message body if insrtion fails status code 401 is returned when requesting to the routes token is needed and it is delivered in header of the request component user-service.js -> login

docs.text: The App is a part of the MERN-stack. PWA (Progressive web app) has created with pwa template npx create-react-app ndvi-demo --template cra-template-pwa 15.05.2024 starting the app login --> server (tech/login.md) token dependency useEffect getAOIs (token) -> server Tools and tests Actually Backend stuff controlled launched/triggered by frontend For this demo use there is limit on sentinel-hub so part of data is already inserted to database using tools of demo app. tools and test are not documented for this report assignment. -------------------------------------------------------- Token Authetication user must be authenticated and provided token every requests to the server. Token based stack. For getting data from server the token is needed Admin user and reqular user Admin user can have tools and test for develiopin a and maintaining the system. https://fullstackopen.com/en/part4/token_authentication Työssä toteutettu fullstack on MERN-stack. Backend on toteutettu Node.js:n päällä toimivaa Express-kirjastoa käyttämällä. Tietokanta on MongoDB-palvelussa, kannan tyyppi on NoSQL. MongoDB-tietokannan käsittelyyn käytetään Mongoose-kirjaston metodeja. Frontend on SPA-sovellus, joka on toteutettu Reactilla. Käyttöliittymän muotoilu on toteutettu React-Bootstrapilla sekä datan visualisointi Plotly-grafiikkakirjastolla. Backendin ja frontendin väliseen kommunikointiin on käytetty socket.io -kirjastoa. Backend ilmoittaa frontendille koska tietokannan päivitys alkoi ja koska se loppui, näin frontedilla näytetään odotustila ja käyttöliittymän käyttö on estetty em. päivitysprosessin aikana. Sovelluksen käyttö vaatii rekisteröinnin ja kirjautumisen. Autentikointi on toteutettu token-perusteisesti. Tokenit ovat JSON Web Token (JWT) -muotoisia tokeneja. Kaikki palvelupyynnät backendiin vaativat token-tunnistautumisen. Jotta tietokanta voidaan päivittää, tarvitaan admin-oikeudet. Token sisältää tällöin myös tämän tiedon ja se tarkistetaan myös backendin päässä, jotta päästään päivittämistä ohjaavaan express-routeen. Frontendissä kutsu backendiin on mahdollista vain admin-oikeuksilla kyseisen painikkeen ollessa käytetävissä/näkyvissä.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Registration In this demo case there is not other requirements for the user data than the email should be unique Some requirements for email formation is checked on UI of the frontend. onditions and restrictions for the data should be defined in frontend and get used before to send data to server. onogdb voisi olla vain database!!!! sequenceDiagram autonumber participant Client participant Server participant MongoDb Client->>Server: POST /ndvi/api/v1/register (email, password) alt Insertion Successful Server->>MongoDb: Insert user data MongoDb-->>Server: Acknowledge insertion Server-->>Client: status 200 (Registration successful) else Insertion Failed Server-->>Client: status 401 (Registration failed, user exists) end request for registration to backend route. user data (email and hash of the password that is generated with the bcrypt.hash function) is inserted into database, returns information of the success or not if insertion is successful status code 200 is returned if insrtion fails status code 401 is returned component user-service.js -> register

docs.text: Getting accumulated tempereture parameters for request { topic: "accumulated_temperature", geometry: geometry, startDate: startDate, endDate: endDate, } sequenceDiagram autonumber participant Frontend participant Backend Frontend->>Backend: GET ndvi/api/v1/weather (TOKEN in header) activate Backend alt success Backend->>Frontend: status 200 (cumulative temperature) else not success Backend->>Frontend: status 404 (not found) deactivate Backend end request for cumulative temperature with parameters and token in header returns cumulative temperature of given period with statuscode 200 returns error status code 404 ehkei mainita??? useAxiosRequest.js hook is used for the http GET request Getting accumulated precipitation parameters for request { topic: "accumulated_precipitation", geometry: geometry, startDate: startDate, endDate: endDate, } sequenceDiagram autonumber participant Frontend participant Backend Frontend->>Backend: GET ndvi/api/v1/weather (TOKEN in header) activate Backend alt success Backend->>Frontend: status 200 (cumulative precipitation) else not success Backend->>Frontend: status 404 (not found) deactivate Backend end request for cumulative precipitation with parameters and token in header returns cumulative precipitation of given period with statuscode 200 returns error status code 404 Getting current weather of specifig AOI parameters for request { topic: "current", geometry: geometry, } sequenceDiagram autonumber participant Frontend participant Backend Frontend->>Backend: GET ndvi/api/v1/weather (TOKEN in header) activate Backend alt success Backend->>Frontend: status 200 (current weather data) else not success Backend->>Frontend: status 404 (not found) deactivate Backend end request for current weather data of specifig AOI with parameters and token in header returns current weather data with statuscode 200 returns error status code 404 ikoni haetaan suoraan osoitteella https://openweathermap.org/img/wn/${currentData.weather[0].icon}.png } alt="Weather Icon" style={{ width: "100px", height: "100px", marginRight: "10px", }} />
